name: Movie Time Periods
description: 40 diverse movie scenes spanning from prehistoric times to 2020s cinema, including ancient civilizations, medieval periods, and modern film eras

prompts.prompt: Prehistoric caveman hunting woolly mammoth with stone spear, ice age landscape, dramatic clash, early human survival struggle
Ancient Egyptian pharaoh on golden throne, massive stone columns with hieroglyphics, servants with palm fans, grand palace interior, Cecil B. DeMille style
Roman gladiator standing in Colosseum arena, sword and shield raised, crowd of spectators in background, dramatic ancient Rome spectacle
Roman legion marching in formation, shields and spears aligned, dusty road through conquered territory, empire expansion epic
Greek philosopher teaching students in marble columned forum, togas and sandals, Athens backdrop, golden hour lighting, classical antiquity
Spartan warrior with bronze helmet and red cape on battlefield, spear in hand, dramatic hero pose, 300-style aesthetic
Viking longship sailing through stormy seas, dragon figurehead prominent, warriors with axes and shields, Nordic conquest voyage
Medieval knight in full armor on horseback, jousting lance ready, castle tournament grounds, colorful heraldic banners flying
King Arthur and Knights of the Round Table in candlelit castle hall, swords on table, medieval feast setting, Excalibur visible
Peasant village under siege, archers on castle walls, battering ram approaching gate, medieval warfare chaos
Joan of Arc in armor holding banner, leading army across battlefield, divine light breaking through clouds, epic medieval heroism
Renaissance artist's studio, painter working on masterpiece, elaborate period costumes, Florence interior, natural window light, 15th century Italy
Pirate captain standing on ship deck, tricorn hat and long coat, treasure map in hand, Caribbean seas, 1700s golden age of piracy
Colonial American Revolution battle, minutemen firing muskets behind stone wall, British redcoats advancing, 1770s historical war scene
Baroque ballroom dance in palace of Versailles, elaborate powdered wigs and silk gowns, chandeliers glowing, 1700s French aristocracy
Wild West gunslinger showdown on dusty main street, high noon sun, tumbleweeds rolling, classic 1800s Western duel
Victorian London street at night, gas lamps glowing in fog, horse-drawn carriage, Sherlock Holmes era detective atmosphere, 1800s mystery
Civil War battlefield, Union and Confederate soldiers clashing, cannon smoke, tattered flags, 1860s American conflict drama
Victorian-era scientist in laboratory with bubbling beakers and electrical equipment, steampunk aesthetic, 1890s scientific discovery
A woman tied to railroad tracks, dramatic hand gesture of distress, wide-eyed expression, black and white silent film style, 1920s aesthetic
prompts.description: Silent era melodrama - damsel in distress

prompts.prompt: Charlie Chaplin-style tramp character with bowler hat and cane, comedic stumbling pose, street corner backdrop, black and white silent film
Sophisticated couple in Art Deco nightclub, elegant 1930s formal wear, champagne glasses raised, glamorous Hollywood golden age lighting
Gangster in pinstripe suit and fedora standing beside vintage 1930s car, tommy gun visible, prohibition era atmosphere
World War II bomber cockpit interior, pilot in leather jacket and aviator goggles, dramatic clouds visible through windscreen, 1940s war film
Femme fatale in evening gown emerging from shadows, cigarette smoke curling, venetian blind shadows on wall, 1940s film noir aesthetic
Rebel teenager in leather jacket leaning against 1950s hot rod, pompadour hairstyle, small town main street, James Dean inspired
Happy suburban family at dinner table, pastel kitchen, mother in apron, father in suit, idealized 1950s Technicolor aesthetic
Epic biblical scene with Moses parting the Red Sea, thousands of extras, grand 1950s Cinemascope spectacle, vivid Technicolor
Hippie protesters with peace signs and flowers, colorful 1960s counterculture fashion, Vietnam era demonstration, documentary-style realism
Mod fashion couple in psychedelic London club, vibrant colors, go-go dancers, 1960s swinging sixties aesthetic, stylized composition
Mafia family gathering around dinner table, 1970s Italian-American setting, warm lighting, powerful patriarch at head of table
Vietnam War soldier in jungle, exhausted expression, monsoon rain, gritty 1970s war film realism, handheld camera aesthetic
Disco dance floor with mirrored ball reflections, colorful platform shoes and bell-bottoms, 1970s Saturday Night Fever style energy
Neon-lit cyberpunk cityscape, flying cars, rain-soaked streets reflecting advertisements, 1980s Blade Runner inspired aesthetic
Muscular action hero with machine gun, explosive background, dramatic 1980s action movie pose, high-key lighting and saturated colors
Suburban teens in mall food court, big hair and bright 1980s fashion, arcade machines visible, John Hughes film aesthetic
Yuppie businessman in power suit with brick-sized cell phone, Wall Street trading floor chaos, 1980s corporate excess
Grunge musician on stage, flannel shirt and ripped jeans, Seattle dive bar, 1990s alternative rock aesthetic, moody lighting
The Matrix-style bullet time shot, character dodging in slow motion, digital rain code in background, late 1990s digital revolution
Superhero landing pose in destroyed city street, dramatic CGI effects, 2010s Marvel Cinematic Universe style, dynamic composition
